name: Search and Url bar tweaks
description: hides the search bar and url bar dropmarkers, bookmark star, and search bar go button when not focused, shrinks the search bar to 26px when not focused or hovered (requires manually dragging it to shrink first) and stops the search bar and url bar turning solid white when focused and reduces opacity when not focused
additional_info: Note - April 2016: this' nolonger compatible with Firefox, but does still work in Palemoon • btw when you want the searchbar to stay expanded, can still drag it out to prefered size, but if less than 250px, will still get expanded to 250 on hover/focus unless you lower that figure • hiding the go button when unfocused is thanks to Search bar go button - Show when typing only also added a min-height value to correct a minor issue • Partly compatible with Searchbar Autoresizer if you set 'Minimum T' to 26, tick the option to clear search query after submitting, and dont tick shrink if empty. I prefer search queries kept in memory, but if you prefer having them cleared, they work fine together.
